entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianGuardsmenDescription
entry.value: The Praetorian Guard are tougher and braver than the average Guardsman, and they specialize in wiping out Neutral units (and to a lesser extent, Orks). Praetorians work best when shoulder-to-shoulder with their comrades.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianGuardsmenFlavor
entry.value: The Praetorian Guard are renowned across the Imperium for their bravery. Their tight discipline and cooperation in the face of insurmountable odds gives Praetorians the grit to carve their mark in the Astra Militarum. With each Guardsman having experienced a lifetime of cruelty and draconian conditions, eliminating the galaxy's savages seem inviting in comparison. The uncivilised barbarians polluting the galaxy shall pay for their sins of survival.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianGrenadierDescription
entry.value: Praetorian Grenadiers are shocktroopers with increased proficiency in handling grenades. They are tougher than even the average Praetorian, and they are extra resilient when charging headfirst into enemy lines.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianGrenadierFlavor
entry.value: Grenadiers are recruited from the tallest, strongest Praetorian Guardsmen. Traditionally, they were trained as siege experts, but the realities of current conflicts led to their specialisation in breaking through enemy lines. Recognisable by their bearskin caps, they can be typically found storming palisades, knowing no doubt nor fear.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianHeavyGunnerSquadDescription
entry.value: Praetorian Maksim Stubgun Squads wield a heavy weapon that specialises in tearing through hordes of enemy infantry.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianHeavyGunnerSquadFlavor
entry.value: "We don't take kindly to filthy tribals trying to 'settle' or 'stay alive' in our God-Emperor-given land."

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianHussarDescription
entry.value: Praetorian Hussars are light cavalry, swiftly entering the battlefield to punch a hole into enemy lines. When the enemy flees, they are easily cut down by sabres.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianHussarFlavor
entry.value: Praetorian Hussars, while relatively recently formed, have their roots in the storied past of the Praetorian Horse Guards.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianCommissarDescription
entry.value: Praetorian Commissars are exceptionally fierce yet inspiring. They push Praetorians to their limits, but their cruelty often breaks weaker troops.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PraetorianCommissarFlavor
entry.value: Praetorians, while no strangers to disproportionately harsh punishments, have their ironclad discipline forged by their Commissars. Praetorian Commissars typically descend from the more fortunate bloodlines in the hives, but that doesn't stop them from planting a boot or bolt shell into a disgraceful soldier.
